name: Today's Boon
effect:
Restores 26–30% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 450–790 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: A vegetable salad. The freshest fruits and vegetables are selected and arrayed alongside rye bread and sprinkled with dressing, making for a delicious and satisfying dish that finds its way daily onto the tables of pious Frostmoon Scions.

suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: A vegetable salad. For some reason, there is an earthy, almost dirt-like flavor, as though you're eating untreated grass. Perhaps a Rimehorn Deer might enjoy this dish better...

normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: A vegetable salad. The freshest fruits and vegetables are selected and arrayed alongside rye bread and sprinkled with dressing, making for a delicious and satisfying dish that finds its way daily onto the tables of pious Frostmoon Scions.

delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: A vegetable salad. A vibrant array of vegetables is given sweetness by the presence of juicy berries and delicately garnished with petals, creating a bountiful feast that blossoms across the taste buds.
